Pre-Game Insights: Lithuania took a hit when Cyprus handed them a 1-0 defeat in their latest encounter.
Lithuania did win the reverse match though, as they secured a triumph to their name by claiming a 2-1 win.
Lithuania join this game on Friday as number 135 in the FIFA world ranking, visitors Cyprus are number 127.
Others: Lithuania scored six times in the last ten outings for an average of 0.6 goals a game. They conceded 17 and managed two clean sheets.

Cyprus travel to their next UEFA Nations League match, averaging a lowly 0.8 goals per game in their last ten matches. They scored a disappointing total of eight goals, while also conceding 17 goals. That amounts to an average of 1.7 per game, in which they kept their opponents from scoring four times.
